did.abstract: Contains records from the Center of Inter-American Studies, which sponsored interdisciplinary language and cultural studies program relating to Latin America.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: A division of the College of Arts and Sciences, the Center for Inter-American Studies was created in 1963 to sponsor programs in interâ€“disciplinary language and area studies relating to Latin America. The center established programs in the Dominican Republic and Costa Rica, and initiated a Master's program in Latin American Studies in 1967. The center was discontinued in 1976/1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, program evaluations, photographs, seminar reports, and publications.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.
